com.aurel.track.accessControl

Class AccessBeans

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aurel.track.accessControl.AccessBeans
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AccessBeans
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class provides an AccessBeans ArrayList mainly for managing user access rights and access to specific issues. It loads all role/project combinations for one person from table TACL in the database and stores the access rights in a hashtable for each project the key being the project id, and the value being an another map with access flag values Furthermore, this class checks to what list types a user has access in a specific project. It creates a hash set containing entries where projectid and list type id are concatenated strings.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getFieldRestrictions

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> getFieldRestrictions(java.lang.Integer personID,
                                                                      java.lang.Integer projectID,
                                                                      java.lang.Integer issueTypeID,
                                                                      boolean edit)
        Returns the fields restrictions for a person on a certain project and issueType By convention a field will be returned only if it is restricted either no read (and consequently no modify) or no modify right
        Parameters:
        personID -
        projectID - can be null, in this case get the field restrictions for all roles the user has in any project
        issueTypeID - can be null, same as by projectID
        edit - whether we are in an editing (edit/create issue) mode or only read only mode (print issue, email sending)

      • getFieldRestrictions

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> getFieldRestrictions(java.lang.Integer personID,
                                                                      java.lang.Integer projectID,
                                                                      java.lang.Integer issueTypeID,
                                                                      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> fieldIDs,
                                                                      boolean edit)
        Returns the fields restrictions for a person for a certain project and issueType A field will be returned only if it is restricted (either no read or no modify right)
        Parameters:
        personID -
        projectID - can be null, in this case get the field restrictions for all roles the user has in any project
        issueTypeID - can be null, same as by projectID
        fieldIDs - can be null, if specified search for restrictions only for these fields
        edit - whether we are in an editing (edit/create issue) mode or only read only mode (print issue, email sending)
        Returns:
        a map with fieldID to restriction

                                                boolean editFlagNeeded)
        Verifies if a person has one of the specific rights for a list of workItemBeans. Specific rights means either a role with any arrRights or a RACI role If the person does not have the right, the workItemBean is removed form the list
        Parameters:
        personID - , the id of the person
        workItemBeans - , list of reportBean which needs o be checked
        editFlagNeeded - whether the edit flag should be set for workItems
